job_details.Functieomschrijving:
You will work in a team of highly skilled engineers, to:
     * Achieve uptime >99.99%.
     * Manage and expand the physical servers, OS's and networks in multiple datacenters.
     * Understand a complex technical architecture with a high degree of customisation.
     * Operate and improve our automation tooling.
     * Participate in 24/7 on-call rotation schedule.
     * Provide a flexible infrastructure to the rest of the company up to and including the base OS layer and kubernetes.
     * Work with a DevOps mindset with other teams within the company to bring our products to a large number of corporate customers worldwide., * A fair salary.
     * A yearly bonus based on yours and the company's performance.
     * 25 days of holiday leave
     * Hybrid working, travel allowance and compensation for your internet costs at home.
     * Holiday allowance and participation in a solid pension plan.
     * Working in a fast-growing company with a motivated international team with over 35 nationalities.
     * Having good equipment.
     * Having an influence on our products.
     * Working comfortably in a brand new office in Amsterdam with our company boat being only a stone's throw away.
     * Free quality lunches, snacks and drinks: whatever you fancy, our kitchen has it all!
     * Being able to participate in weekly bootcamp sessions or yoga classes.
     * Enjoying a weekly chair massage.
     * Chilled drinks on Friday.
     * Participating in our yearly week-long hackathon but also joining meet-ups, training courses and/or scientific conferences.
job_details.full_text:
Linux/Infra System Engineer

You will work in a team of highly skilled engineers, to:
     * Achieve uptime >99.99%.
     * Manage and expand the physical servers, OS's and networks in multiple datacenters.
     * Understand a complex technical architecture with a high degree of customisation.
     * Operate and improve our automation tooling.
     * Participate in 24/7 on-call rotation schedule.
     * Provide a flexible infrastructure to the rest of the company up to and including the base OS layer and kubernetes.
     * Work with a DevOps mindset with other teams within the company to bring our products to a large number of corporate customers worldwide., * A fair salary.
     * A yearly bonus based on yours and the company's performance.
     * 25 days of holiday leave
     * Hybrid working, travel allowance and compensation for your internet costs at home.
     * Holiday allowance and participation in a solid pension plan.
     * Working in a fast-growing company with a motivated international team with over 35 nationalities.
     * Having good equipment.
     * Having an influence on our products.
     * Working comfortably in a brand new office in Amsterdam with our company boat being only a stone's throw away.
     * Free quality lunches, snacks and drinks: whatever you fancy, our kitchen has it all!
     * Being able to participate in weekly bootcamp sessions or yoga classes.
     * Enjoying a weekly chair massage.
     * Chilled drinks on Friday.
     * Participating in our yearly week-long hackathon but also joining meet-ups, training courses and/or scientific conferences.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on infrastructure management, system administration, and DevOps principles within a Linux/Infra environment. It does not mention any specific AI, ML, or GenAI technologies, models, or frameworks, nor does it involve tasks related to developing or deploying AI-specific solutions. The core responsibilities align with traditional infrastructure engineering rather than the specialized roles defined for ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer.

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions 'Operate and improve our automation tooling' and 'Work with a DevOps mindset', which are core components of operations engineering and MLOps, focusing on maintaining and improving systems and processes.
job_tasks.phrase: Operate and improve our automation tooling

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Provide a flexible infrastructure to the rest of the company up to and including the base OS layer and kubernetes' directly relates to managing and providing the operational infrastructure, including container orchestration, which is a key aspect of MLOps.
job_tasks.phrase: Provide a flexible infrastructure to the rest of the company up to and including the base OS layer and kubernetes

job_tasks.justification: While not directly building user-facing applications, managing 'physical servers, OS's and networks' and ensuring 'uptime >99.99%' requires a strong foundation in system-level software and infrastructure development principles.
job_tasks.phrase: Manage and expand the physical servers, OS's and networks in multiple datacenters

job_tasks.justification: The requirement to 'Understand a complex technical architecture with a high degree of customisation' and 'Work with a DevOps mindset with other teams within the company to bring our products to a large number of corporate customers worldwide' indicates a need to grasp the business context and how infrastructure supports product delivery.
job_tasks.phrase: Understand a complex technical architecture with a high degree of customisation

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'Participate in 24/7 on-call rotation schedule' is a common responsibility within operations engineering roles to ensure system availability.

soft_skills.phrase: Work with a DevOps mindset with other teams within the company
Having an influence on our products
Participating in our yearly week-long hackathon but also joining meet-ups, training courses and/or scientific conferences
